verses.arabic: حمٓ
verses.english: Ha, Meem.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.english: By the clear Book,
verses.hausa: Ina rantsuwa da Littãfi Mabayyani.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَٰنًا عَرَبِيًّا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur'an that you might understand.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, Mun sanya shi abin karãtu na Lãrabci, tsammãninku, kunã hankalta.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِىٓ أُمِّ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَدَيْنَا لَعَلِىٌّ حَكِيمٌ
verses.english: And indeed it is, in the Mother of the Book with Us, exalted and full of wisdom.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, shĩ, a cikin uwar littãfi a wurin Mu, haƙĩƙa, maɗaukaki ne, bayyananne.

verses.arabic: أَفَنَضْرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَ صَفْحًا أَن كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا مُّسْرِفِينَ
verses.english: Then should We turn the message away, disregarding you, because you are a transgressing people?
verses.hausa: Shin, zã Mu kau da kai daga saukar da hukunci daga gare ku ne dõmin kun kasance mutane mãsu ɓarna?

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن نَّبِىٍّ فِى ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples,
verses.hausa: Alhãli kuwa sau nawa Muka aika wani Annabi a cikin mutãnen fãrko!

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِىٍّ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: But there would not come to them a prophet except that they used to ridicule him.
verses.hausa: Kuma wani Annabi bai je musu ba fãce sun kasance, game da shi, sunã mãsu yin izgili.

verses.arabic: فَأَهْلَكْنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: And We destroyed greater than them in [striking] power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka halakar da waɗanda suke sũ ne mafiya ƙarfin damƙa daga gare su. Kuma abin misãlin mutãnen farkon ya shũɗe.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: And if you should ask them, "Who has created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "They were created by the Exalted in Might, the Knowing."
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, idan ka tambaye su, "Wãne ne ya halitta sammai da ƙasa?" Lalle zã su ce, "Mabuwãyi Mai ilmi ne Ya halitta su."

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: [The one] who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided
verses.hausa: Wanda Ya sanya muku ƙasa shimfiɗa kuma Ya sanya muku hanyõyi a cikinta, tsammãninku za ku nẽmi shiryuwa.'

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَنشَرْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخْرَجُونَ
verses.english: And who sends down rain from the sky in measured amounts, and We revive thereby a dead land - thus will you be brought forth -
verses.hausa: Kuma Wanda Ya saukar da ruwa daga sama, a kan wani gwargwado, sai Muka rãyar da gari matacce game da shi. Kamar haka nan ake fitar da ku (daga kabari).

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْفُلْكِ وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ مَا تَرْكَبُونَ
verses.english: And who created the species, all of them, and has made for you of ships and animals those which you mount.
verses.hausa: Kuma Wanda Ya halitta ma'aura dukansu, kuma Ya sanya muku, daga jirgi da dabbõbin ni'ima, abin da kuke hawa.

verses.arabic: لِتَسْتَوُۥا۟ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِۦ ثُمَّ تَذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَةَ رَبِّكُمْ إِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ وَتَقُولُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُۥ مُقْرِنِينَ
verses.english: That you may settle yourselves upon their backs and then remember the favor of your Lord when you have settled upon them and say. "Exalted is He who has subjected this to us, and we could not have [otherwise] subdued it.
verses.hausa: Domin ku daidaitu a kan bãyansa, sa'an nan ku tuna ni'imar Ubangijinku a lõkacin da kuka daidaita a kansa kuma ku ce, "Tsarki ya tabbata ga Wanda Ya hõre mana wannan alhãli kuwa ba mu kasance mãsu iya rinjãya gare Shi ba.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.english: And indeed we, to our Lord, will [surely] return."
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle mũ haƙĩƙa mãsu jũyãwa muke, zuwa ga Ubangijinmu."

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ جُزْءًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَكَفُورٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: But they have attributed to Him from His servants a portion. Indeed, man is clearly ungrateful.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka sanya Masa juz'i daga bãyinsa. Lalle ne mutum, haƙĩƙa, mai yawan kãfirci ne, mai bayyanãwar kãfircin.

verses.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ بَنَاتٍ وَأَصْفَىٰكُم بِٱلْبَنِينَ
verses.english: Or has He taken, out of what He has created, daughters and chosen you for [having] sons?
verses.hausa: Kõ zã Ya ɗauki 'ya'ya mãtã daga abin da Yake halittawa ne, kuma Ya zãɓe ku da ɗiya maza?

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِمَا ضَرَبَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مَثَلًا ظَلَّ وَجْهُهُۥ مُسْوَدًّا وَهُوَ كَظِيمٌ
verses.english: And when one of them is given good tidings of that which he attributes to the Most Merciful in comparison, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.
verses.hausa: Alhãli kuwa idan an bãyar da bushãra ga ɗayansu da abin da ya buga misãli da shi ga Mai rahama, sai fuskarsa ta yini tanã wadda aka baƙanta launinta, kuma yanã cike da baƙin ciki.

verses.arabic: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُا۟ فِى ٱلْحِلْيَةِ وَهُوَ فِى ٱلْخِصَامِ غَيْرُ مُبِينٍ
verses.english: So is one brought up in ornaments while being during conflict unevident [attributed to Allah]?
verses.hausa: Ashe, kuma (Allah zai zãɓi) wanda ake rẽno a cikin ƙawa alhãli kuwa gã shi a husũma bã mai iya bayyanawar magana ba?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عِبَـٰدُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ إِنَـٰثًا ۚ أَشَهِدُوا۟ خَلْقَهُمْ ۚ سَتُكْتَبُ شَهَـٰدَتُهُمْ وَيُسْـَٔلُونَ
verses.english: And they have made the angels, who are servants of the Most Merciful, females. Did they witness their creation? Their testimony will be recorded, and they will be questioned.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka mayar da malã'iku ('yã'ya) mãtã, alhãli kuwa sũ, waɗanda suke bãyin (Allah) Mai rahama ne! Shin, sun halarci halittarsu ne? zã a rubũta shaidarsu kuma a tambaye su.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ شَآءَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَا عَبَدْنَـٰهُم ۗ مَّا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَخْرُصُونَ
verses.english: And they said, "If the Most Merciful had willed, we would not have worshipped them." They have of that no knowledge. They are not but falsifying.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Dã Mai rahama ya so, dã ba mu bauta musu ba." Bã su da wani ilmi game da wancan! Bãbu abin da suke yi fãce yanki-faɗi.

verses.arabic: أَمْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ كِتَـٰبًا مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسْتَمْسِكُونَ
verses.english: Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering?
verses.hausa: Kõ Mun bã su wani littãfi ne a gabãninsa (Alƙur'ãni) sabõda haka da shĩ suke riƙe?

verses.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٍ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: Rather, they say, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are in their footsteps [rightly] guided."
verses.hausa: Ã'a, sun ce dai, "Lalle mũ, mun sãmi ubanninmu a kan wani addini (na al'ãda) kuma lalle mũ, a kan gurãbunsu muke mãsu nẽman shiryuwa."

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى قَرْيَةٍ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتْرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٍ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم مُّقْتَدُونَ
verses.english: And similarly, We did not send before you any warner into a city except that its affluent said, "Indeed, we found our fathers upon a religion, and we are, in their footsteps, following."
verses.hausa: Kuma kamar haka, ba Mu aika wani mai gargaɗi ba a gabãninka, a cikin wata alƙarya, fãce mani'imtanta sun ce, "Lalle mũ, mun sãmi ubanninmu a kan wani addini kuma lalle mũ, mãsu kõyi nea kan gurãbunsu."

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكُم بِأَهْدَىٰ مِمَّا وَجَدتُّمْ عَلَيْهِ ءَابَآءَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرْسِلْتُم بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: [Each warner] said, "Even if I brought you better guidance than that [religion] upon which you found your fathers?" They said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."
verses.hausa: (Sai mai gargaɗin) ya ce: "Shin, ban zo muku da abin da ya fi zama shiriya daga abin da kuka sãmi ubanninku a kansa ba?" Suka ce, "Lalle mũ dai mãsu kafirta ne game da abin da aka aiko ku da shi."

verses.arabic: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.english: So we took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka Muka yi musu azãbar rãmuwa. To, ka dũbi yadda ãƙibar mãsu ƙaryatãwa take.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّنِى بَرَآءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.english: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship
verses.hausa: Kuma (ka ambaci) lõkacin da Ibrãhĩm ya ce wa ubansada mutãnensa, "Lalle nĩ mai barranta ne daga abin da kuke bautãwa."

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى فَإِنَّهُۥ سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.english: Except for He who created me; and indeed, He will guide me."
verses.hausa: "Fãce wannan da Ya ƙãga halittata, to, lalle Shĩ ne zai shiryar da ni."

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَهَا كَلِمَةًۢ بَاقِيَةً فِى عَقِبِهِۦ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.english: And he made it a word remaining among his descendants that they might return [to it].
verses.hausa: Kuma (Ibrãhĩm) ya sanya (ita wannan magana) kalma mai wanzuwa a cikin zuriyarsa, tsammãninsu su kõmo daga ɓata.

verses.arabic: بَلْ مَتَّعْتُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ وَرَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: However, I gave enjoyment to these [people of Makkah] and their fathers until there came to them the truth and a clear Messenger.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, Na jiyar da waɗannan mutãne dãɗi sũ da ubanninsu har gaskiya, da Manzo mai bayyanawar gaskiyar, ya zo musu.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: But when the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and indeed we are, concerning it, disbelievers."
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da gaskiyar ta jẽ musu sai suka ce: "Wannan sihiri ne kuma mũ mãsu kãfirta da shi ne."

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍ مِّنَ ٱلْقَرْيَتَيْنِ عَظِيمٍ
verses.english: And they said, "Why was this Qur'an not sent down upon a great man from [one of] the two cities?"
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Don me ba a saukar da wannan Alƙur'ãni a kan wani mutum mai girma daga alƙaryun nan biyu ba?"

verses.arabic: أَهُمْ يَقْسِمُونَ رَحْمَتَ رَبِّكَ ۚ نَحْنُ قَسَمْنَا بَيْنَهُم مَّعِيشَتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَرَفَعْنَا بَعْضَهُمْ فَوْقَ بَعْضٍ دَرَجَـٰتٍ لِّيَتَّخِذَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا سُخْرِيًّا ۗ وَرَحْمَتُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّا يَجْمَعُونَ
verses.english: Do they distribute the mercy of your Lord? It is We who have apportioned among them their livelihood in the life of this world and have raised some of them above others in degrees [of rank] that they may make use of one another for service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.
verses.hausa: Shin, sũ ne ke raba rahamar Ubangijinka? Mũ ne, Muka raba musu abincinsu a cikin rãyuwar dũniya, kuma Muka ɗaukaka waɗansunsu a kan waɗansu da darajõji dõmin waɗansunsu su riƙi waɗansu lẽburori kumarahamar Ubangijinka (ta Annabci), ita ce mafificiya daga abin da suke tãrãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً لَّجَعَلْنَا لِمَن يَكْفُرُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمْ سُقُفًا مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيْهَا يَظْهَرُونَ
verses.english: And if it were not that the people would become one community [of disbelievers], We would have made for those who disbelieve in the Most Merciful - for their houses - ceilings and stairways of silver upon which to mount
verses.hausa: Kuma bã dõmin mutane su kasance al'umma ɗaya ba, lalle ne, dã Mun sanya wa mãsu kãfircẽ wa Mai Rahama, a gidãjensu, rufi na azurfa, kuma da matãkalai, ya zama a kanta suke tãƙãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلِبُيُوتِهِمْ أَبْوَٰبًا وَسُرُرًا عَلَيْهَا يَتَّكِـُٔونَ
verses.english: And for their houses - doors and couches [of silver] upon which to recline
verses.hausa: Kuma a gidãjensu, Mu sanya) ƙyamãre da gadãje, a kansu suke kishingiɗa.

verses.arabic: وَزُخْرُفًا ۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: And gold ornament. But all that is not but the enjoyment of worldly life. And the Hereafter with your Lord is for the righteous.
verses.hausa: Da zĩnãriya. Kuma dukan wancan abu bai zama ba, sai jin dãɗin rãyuwar dũniya nekawai' alhãli kuwa Lãhira, a wurin Ubangijinka, ta mãsu taƙawa ce.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَعْشُ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ نُقَيِّضْ لَهُۥ شَيْطَـٰنًا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٌ
verses.english: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion.
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda ya makanta daga barin hukuncin Mai rahama, to, zã Mu lulluɓe shi da shaiɗan, watau shĩ ne abõkinsa.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, the devils avert them from the way [of guidance] while they think that they are [rightly] guided
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle su haƙĩƙa sunã kange su daga hanya, kuma sunã Zaton cẽwa sũ mãsu shiryuwa ne.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَنَا قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكَ بُعْدَ ٱلْمَشْرِقَيْنِ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرِينُ
verses.english: Until, when he comes to Us [at Judgement], he says [to his companion], "Oh, I wish there was between me and you the distance between the east and west - how wretched a companion."
verses.hausa: Har a lõkacin da (abõkin Shaiɗan) ya zo Mana (ya mutu) sai ya ce: (wa Shaiɗan) "Dã dai a tsakãnina da tsakãninka akwai nĩsan gabas da yamma, sabõda haka, tir da kai ga zama abõkin mutum!"

verses.arabic: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِذ ظَّلَمْتُمْ أَنَّكُمْ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
verses.english: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are [all] sharing in the punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma (wannan magana) bã za ta amfãne ku ba, a yau, dõmin kun yi zãlunci, lalle ku mãsu tãrẽwa ne a cikin azãba.

verses.arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوْ تَهْدِى ٱلْعُمْىَ وَمَن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Then will you make the deaf hear, [O Muhammad], or guide the blind or he who is in clear error?
verses.hausa: Shin to, kai kanã jiyar da kurma ne, ko kanã shiryar da makãho da wanda ke a cikin ɓata bayyananna?

verses.arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذْهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنْهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ
verses.english: And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them.
verses.hausa: To, kõ dai Mu tafi da kai to, lalle Mũ, mãsu yin azãbarrãmu, wa ne a kansu.

verses.arabic: أَوْ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِى وَعَدْنَـٰهُمْ فَإِنَّا عَلَيْهِم مُّقْتَدِرُونَ
verses.english: Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability.
verses.hausa: Kõ kuma Mu nũna maka abin da Muka yi musu wa'adi, to, lalle Mũ, Mãsu ĩkon tasarrufi a kansu ne.

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَمْسِكْ بِٱلَّذِىٓ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.english: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka yi riƙo ga abin da aka yi wahayi da shi zuwa gaie ka. Lalle ne kai, kanã a kan hanya madaidaiciyl.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكْرٌ لَّكَ وَلِقَوْمِكَ ۖ وَسَوْفَ تُسْـَٔلُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned.
verses.hausa: Kuma shi (abin wahayin) ambato (na ɗaukaka) ne a gare ka da kuma ga mutãnenka, kuma zã a tambaye ku.

verses.arabic: وَسْـَٔلْ مَنْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلْنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ءَالِهَةً يُعْبَدُونَ
verses.english: And ask those We sent before you of Our messengers; have We made besides the Most Merciful deities to be worshipped?
verses.hausa: Kuma ka tambayi waɗanda Muka aika a gabãninka daga Manzannin Mu, "Shin, Mun sanya waɗansu gumãka, wasun (Allah), Mai rahama, anã bauta musu?"

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَقَالَ إِنِّى رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And certainly did We send Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, and he said, "Indeed, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds."
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun aika Mũsã, game da ãyõyin Mu, zuwa ga Fir'auna da mashãwartansa, sai ya ce: "Lalle nĩ, Manzo ne daga Ubangijin halittu."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنْهَا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.english: But when he brought them Our signs, at once they laughed at them.
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da ya jẽ musu da ãyõyinMu, sai gã su sunã yi musu dãriya.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نُرِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ إِلَّا هِىَ أَكْبَرُ مِنْ أُخْتِهَا ۖ وَأَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.english: And We showed them not a sign except that it was greater than its sister, and We seized them with affliction that perhaps they might return [to faith].
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu nũna musu wata ãyã ba, fãce ita ce mafi girma daga 'yar'uwarta. Kuma Muka kãma su da azãba, tsammãninsu kõ sunã kõmõwa.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: And they said [to Moses], "O magician, invoke for us your Lord by what He has promised you. Indeed, we will be guided."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Yã kai mai sihiri! Ka rõƙa mana Ubangijinka da albarkacin abin da yi alkawari a wurinka, lalle mũ, haƙĩƙa, mãsu shiryuwa ne."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمْ يَنكُثُونَ
verses.english: But when We removed from them the affliction, at once they broke their word.
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da duk Muka kuranye musu azãba, sai gã su sunã warware alkawarinsu.

verses.arabic: وَنَادَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى قَوْمِهِۦ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَيْسَ لِى مُلْكُ مِصْرَ وَهَـٰذِهِ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِىٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.english: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see?
verses.hausa: Kuma Fir'auna ya yi kira a cikin mutãnensa, ya ce: "Ya mutãnẽna! Ashe mulkin Masar bã a gare ni yake ba, kuma waɗannan kõguna sunã gudãna daga ƙarƙashĩna? Ashe, ba ku gani ba?"

verses.arabic: أَمْ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ مَهِينٌ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ
verses.english: Or am I [not] better than this one who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear?
verses.hausa: "Kõ kuma bã nĩ ne mafĩfĩci ba daga wannan wanda yake shĩ wulakantacce ne kuma bã ya iya bayyanawar magana sai da ƙyar?

verses.arabic: فَلَوْلَآ أُلْقِىَ عَلَيْهِ أَسْوِرَةٌ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوْ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ مُقْتَرِنِينَ
verses.english: Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction?"
verses.hausa: "To, don me, ba a jẽfa mundãye na zĩnãriya a kansaba, kõ kuma malã'iku su taho tãre da shi haɗe?"

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَخَفَّ قَوْمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.english: So he bluffed his people, and they obeyed him. Indeed, they were [themselves] a people defiantly disobedient [of Allah].
verses.hausa: Sai ya sassabce hankalin mutãnensa, sabõda haka suka bĩ shi. Lalle sũ, sun kasance waɗansu irin mutãne ne fãsiƙai.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka a lõkacin da suka husãtar da Mu, Muka yi musu azãbar rãmuwa sai Muka nutsar da su gabã ɗaya.

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ سَلَفًا وَمَثَلًا لِّلْـَٔاخِرِينَ
verses.english: And We made them a precedent and an example for the later peoples.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka sanya su magabãta kuma abin misãli ga mutãnen ƙarshe.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوْمُكَ مِنْهُ يَصِدُّونَ
verses.english: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud.
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da aka buga misãli da ¦an Maryama, sai gã mutãnenka daga gare shi (shi misalin) sunã dãriya da izgili.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ ءَأَـٰلِهَتُنَا خَيْرٌ أَمْ هُوَ ۚ مَا ضَرَبُوهُ لَكَ إِلَّا جَدَلًۢا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ خَصِمُونَ
verses.english: And they said, "Are your gods better, or is he?" They did not present the comparison except for [mere] argument. But, [in fact], they are a people prone to dispute.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Shin, gumãkanmu ne mafĩfĩta kõ shi (¦an Maryama)?" Ba su buga wannan misãli ba a gare ka fãce dõmin yin jidãli. Ã'a, sũ mutãne nemãsu husũma.

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا عَبْدٌ أَنْعَمْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ مَثَلًا لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
verses.english: Jesus was not but a servant upon whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel.
verses.hausa: Shi (¦an Maryama) bai zama ba fãce wani bãwa ne, Mun yi ni'ima a gare shi, kuma Muka sanya shi abin kõyi ga Banĩ Isrã'ĩla.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَا مِنكُم مَّلَـٰٓئِكَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَخْلُفُونَ
verses.english: And if We willed, We could have made [instead] of you angels succeeding [one another] on the earth.
verses.hausa: Kuma dã Munã so lalle ne dã Mun sanya malã'iku, daga ci, kinku, a cikin ƙasa, sunã mayẽwa

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَعِلْمٌ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمْتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَٱتَّبِعُونِ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.english: And indeed, Jesus will be [a sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle shĩ, haƙĩƙa, wani ilmi ne na Sa'a, sabõda haka, kada ku yi shakka a gare ta, kuma ku bĩ Ni. Wannan ita ce hanya madaidaiciya.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
verses.hausa: Kuma kada Shaiɗan ya taushe ku (daga hanyar). Lalle shĩ maƙiyi ne a gare ku, mai bayyanãwar ƙiyayya.

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ عِيسَىٰ بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ قَالَ قَدْ جِئْتُكُم بِٱلْحِكْمَةِ وَلِأُبَيِّنَ لَكُم بَعْضَ ٱلَّذِى تَخْتَلِفُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.english: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me.
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da Ĩsã ya jẽ da hujjõji bayyanannu, ya ce: "Lalle ne nã zo muku da hikima kuma dõmin in bayyana muku, sãshen abin da kuke sãɓã wa jũna acikinsa, sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'a."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.english: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, Allah Shĩ ne Ubangijina kuma Shi ne Ubangijinku sabõda haka ku bauta Masa. Wannan ita ce hanya madaidaiciya."

verses.arabic: فَٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْ ۖ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.english: But the denominations from among them differed [and separated], so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day.
verses.hausa: Sai ƙungiyõyi suka sãɓa a tsakãninsu. To, bone yã tabbata ga waɗanda suka yi zãlunci daga azãbar yini mai raɗaɗi!

verses.arabic: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not?
verses.hausa: Shin sunã jiran wani abu ne? sai dai Sa'a ta jẽ musu bisaga abke, alhãli kuwa ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: ٱلْأَخِلَّآءُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَعْضُهُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous
verses.hausa: Masõya a yinin nan, sãshensu zuwa ga sãshe maƙiya ne, fãce mãsu taƙawa (sũ kam mãsu son jũna ne).

verses.arabic: يَـٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمْ تَحْزَنُونَ
verses.english: [To whom Allah will say], "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve,
verses.hausa: Ya bãyĩNa! Bãbu tsõro a kanku a yau, kuma bã zã ku yi baƙin ciki ba.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.english: [You] who believed in Our verses and were Muslims.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni da ãyõyinMu, kuma suka kasance mãsu sallamawar al'amari (ga Allah).

verses.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ أَنتُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُكُمْ تُحْبَرُونَ
verses.english: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted."
verses.hausa: Ku shiga Aljanna, kũ da mãtan aurenku, anã girmama ku.

verses.arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِصِحَافٍ مِّن ذَهَبٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ ۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشْتَهِيهِ ٱلْأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلْأَعْيُنُ ۖ وَأَنتُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally.
verses.hausa: Anã kẽwayãwa a kansu da akussa na zĩnãriya da kõfuna, alhãli kuwa a cikinsu akwai abin da rãyuka ke marmari kuma idãnu su ji dãɗi, kuma kũ, a cikinta (Aljannar), madawwama ne.

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُورِثْتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do.
verses.hausa: Kuma waccan ita ce Aljannar, wannan da aka gãdar da ku ita sabõda abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: لَكُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ كَثِيرَةٌ مِّنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.english: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat.
verses.hausa: Kunã sãmu, a cikinta, 'yã'yan itãcen marmari mãsu yawa, daga cikinsu kuke ci.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.
verses.hausa: Lalle mãsu laifi madawwama ne a cikin azãbar Jahannama.

verses.arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنْهُمْ وَهُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
verses.english: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair.
verses.hausa: Bã a sauƙaƙar da ita (azãbar) daga gare su, alhãli kuwa sũ, a cikinta, mãsu kãsa magana ne.

verses.arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu zãlunce su ba, amma sũ ne suka kasance azzãlumai.

verses.arabic: وَنَادَوْا۟ يَـٰمَـٰلِكُ لِيَقْضِ عَلَيْنَا رَبُّكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّـٰكِثُونَ
verses.english: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka yi kira, "Ya Mãliku! Ubangijinka Ya kashe mu mana " (Mãliku) ya ce: "Lalle kũ mazauna ne."

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ جِئْنَـٰكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَكُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.english: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun jẽ muku da gaskiya, kuma amma mafi yawanku mãsu ƙi ga gaskiyar ne.

verses.arabic: أَمْ أَبْرَمُوٓا۟ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّا مُبْرِمُونَ
verses.english: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan].
verses.hausa: Kõ kuma sun tukka wani al'amari ne? To, lalle Mũ, Mãsu tukkãwa ne.

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّا لَا نَسْمَعُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوَىٰهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَرُسُلُنَا لَدَيْهِمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.english: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, [We do], and Our messengers are with them recording.
verses.hausa: Ko sunã zaton lalle Mũ, bã Mu jin asĩrinsu da gãnãwarsu? Na'am! Kuma manzannin Mu na tãre da su sunã rubũtãwa.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَلَدٌ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلْعَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of [his] worshippers."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Idan har akwai ɗã ga Mai rahama, to, nĩ ne farkon mãsu bauta (wa ɗan)."

verses.arabic: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَرْشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.english: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
verses.hausa: Tsarkin Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa, Ubangijin Al'arshi, ya tabbata daga abin da suke sifantãwa.

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.english: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka ƙyãlẽ su, su kũtsa kuma su yi wãsã har su haɗu da yininsu, wanda ake yi musu wa'adi da shi.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَـٰهٌ وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَـٰهٌ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing.
verses.hausa: Kuma Shĩ ne wanda ke abin bautãwa a sama kuma abin bautãwa a ƙasa, kuma, Shĩ ne Mai hikima, Masani.

verses.arabic: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned.
verses.hausa: Kuma albarkar wanda ke da mulkin sammai da ƙasã abin da ke a tsakãninsu tã bayyana, kuma a wurinSa ne ilmin Sa'a yake, kuma zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَمْلِكُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَن شَهِدَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess [power of] intercession; but only those who testify to the truth [can benefit], and they know.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke kira baicinSa ba su mallaki cẽto ba, fãce wanda ya yi shaida da gaskiya, kuma sũ, sunã sane (da haka).

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَهُمْ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
verses.english: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle idan ka tambaye su: "Wãne ne ya halitta su?" Lalle ne zã su ce Allah ne. To, yãya ake jũyar da su?

verses.arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."
verses.hausa: Kuma da (ilmin) maganarSa (Annabi) "Ya Ubangijĩna! Lalle waɗannan mutãne ne waɗanda bã zã su yi ĩmãni ba."

verses.arabic: فَٱصْفَحْ عَنْهُمْ وَقُلْ سَلَـٰمٌ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know.
verses.hausa: To, sai ka kau da kai daga gare su, kuma ka ce, "salãmã." Sa'an nan kuma zã su sani.
